name: SKYJACKER: Starship Constructor
blurb: An interactive spaceship construction app, featuring 100+ ships from the upcoming space game SKYJACKER

rewards.reward: POCKET EDITION: Starship Constructor for any one platform + a wallpaper pack for all devices + our heartfelt thanks. We appreciate your contribution!
COMPLETIONIST EDITION: Starship Constructor for all platforms on release + the wallpaper pack + the official game soundtrack.  (DRM-free digital download, 320k or lossless.)

COLLECTOR EDITION: As the Completionist Edition, plus: Skyjacker ArtBook in PDF.  (100+ pages of concept art, detailed illustrations of alien races, planetary habitats, designs and technology, and extras left on the cutting-room floor.)
COLLECTOR BUNDLE: A bundle of two Collector Editions for you and a friend. You\u2019ll receive two of everything that includes that tier.

PRIVATEER EDITION: As the Collector Edition, plus: Skyjacker in all of its unearthly beauty on PC, Mac or Linux (DRM-free digital download, direct or Steam if we make it) + exclusive access to Beta releases and the private discussion community.
PRIVATEER BUNDLE: A bundle of two Privateer Editions for you and a friend. You\u2019ll receive two of everything that includes that tier.
SETTLER EDITION: As the Privateer Edition, plus: ALL FUTURE DIGITAL CONTENT we make for Skyjacker, be it app, game, any expansion pack or even books or movies - everything for free, forever!
SETTLER BUNDLE: A bundle of two Settler Editions for you and a friend.  You\u2019ll receive two of everything that can be downloaded, past, present and future.

FLASH BUNDLE: As the Settler Edition, plus: the Portable Skyjacker USB drive, pre-loaded with the Complete Edition of the game.  (Physical items ship free within the US; please add $15 to your pledge for international shipping.)

ART BUNDLE: As the Flash Bundle, plus: the Skyjacker sketchbook (a trade paperback collection of sketches, roughs, blueprints, outtakes, inside information and development trivia), and your name in the credits.
WINTER BUNDLE: As the Art Bundle, plus: a limited edition jacket with the Skyjacker logo, and your name in the credits in extra large font.

WOLFPACK: As the Winter Bundle, plus: a physical game box with the soundtrack on CD as well as the game DVD. It\u2019ll be personally signed by our team leads. In addition, we\u2019ll hook all your friends up too by giving you FOUR downloads of everything digital. Enjoy our generosity!

MEMEPACK: As the Wolfpack, plus: we\u2019ll ship you a limited edition print of the SKYJACKER game poster in full size (36\u201d x 24\u201d) for your bedroom, barracks, hangar or gun cabinet. You know, how good are we in the art production. So just imagine how beautiful that poster will be!

BROKER BUNDLE: As the Memepack, plus: the hardcover Skyjacker Art Book, a professionally-bound portfolio of full color plates.  You also get to name something in the game (a weapon, part, planet, or ship - we\u2019ll make sure it\u2019s something you like).

BOSS BUNDLE: As the Broker Bundle, plus: our designers will draw YOU, in full space pirate regalia, and put it on an exclusive jacket.  Materials and exact design to be determined - but it'll be nice.  You can also name a character in-game (or leave it as a designation, your choice).

PATRON BUNDLE: As the Boss Bundle, plus: we'll put you in the game.  We'll animate YOU in 3D as the subject for a CUSTOM PLAYER CHARACTER, appearing both in Skyjacker and in the Starship Constructor. This includes your face and proportions, a personal logo, and the highest category of criminal community rating in the game.  On top of that - name your reward.  What would you like?  Another artbook, a second exclusive jacket for your friend?  Let's talk.

I'M A LEGEND! - As the Patron Bundle, plus: with your permission, we'll use your character in our promotional campaigns. You'll be on our posters, in our trailers, and on whatever other media we produce. Your name will, in fact, be Legend. Furthermore we cordially invite you to visit Ukraine in August on weekend to celebrate with us an Independence Days of Ukraine (August 24, Saturday). As a part of the program is to visit the real JOUST! (http://www.parkkyivrus.com/images/stories/Turnir2012/Turnir2021.jpg) Please contact us directly to make personal arrangements before the end of the campaign!
